TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Keyboard extends System.Object
public ref class Keyboard abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示键盘设备。

span.span: Represents the keyboard device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供与键盘相关的事件、 方法和属性提供有关键盘的状态信息。The class provides keyboard-related events, methods, and properties that provide information regarding the state of the keyboard. 每个事件，定义附加的事件重新还公开由基元素类和为新的路由事件。Each of the events that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 通常情况下，会更方便，若要处理的应用程序的键盘事件和，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle keyboard events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 能够接收键盘输入的元素的顺序中的元素必须可获得焦点。In order for an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 大多数派生的对象是默认情况下可获得焦点。Most derived objects are focusable by default. 否则，若要使元素可获得焦点的情况下，将设置到基元素的属性上`true`。Otherwise, to make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 类，如和，设置的默认值到`false`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`. 因此，对于要获取键盘焦点时，这些对象必须设置为`true`。Therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 键盘焦点是指在接收键盘输入的对象。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有键盘焦点的元素具有设置为`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以仅有一个元素具有键盘焦点在整个桌面。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 逻辑焦点是指具有焦点的焦点作用域中的对象。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 静态成员类委托到主副本调用线程，因此它们不一定是线程安全。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread, so they are not necessarily thread-safe. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定键是否处于的切换状态。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if a key is in the toggled state. 如果传递给是切换，更改按钮的背景。If the passed to is toggled, the background of a button is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)]

.method public static hidebysig void ClearFocus() cil managed
Public Shared Sub ClearFocus ()
public: static void ClearFocus();

summary.span: 清除焦点。

span.span: Clears focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 Win32 窗口内有焦点，WPF 调用焦点在关闭菜单时还原上的方法。If focus is within a Win32 window, WPF calls the method on restoration of focus when a menu is closed. Win32 焦点时使菜单模式，就会归还则寄宿子 HWND，且元素不具有 WPF 焦点。When leaving menu mode, Win32 focus is returned to the hosted child HWND, and no element has WPF focus.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode DefaultRestoreFocusMode { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode DefaultRestoreFocusMode
Public Shared Property DefaultRestoreFocusMode As RestoreFocusMode

param.name: element
param.span: 要对其设置键盘焦点的元素。

span.span: The element on which to set keyboard focus.

summary.span: 对指定元素设置键盘焦点。

span.span: Sets keyboard focus on the specified element.
The element with keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 能够接收键盘输入的元素，该元素必须是可获得焦点。For an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 若要使元素可获得焦点的情况下，将设置到基元素的属性上`true`。To make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 类，如和，设置的默认值到`false`; 因此，对于要获取键盘焦点时，这些对象必须设置为`true`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`; therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 键盘焦点是指在接收键盘输入的对象。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有键盘焦点的元素具有设置为`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以仅有一个元素具有键盘焦点在整个桌面。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 逻辑焦点是指具有焦点的焦点作用域中的对象。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有键盘焦点的元素还具有逻辑焦点提供给该元素所属的焦点作用域。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有逻辑焦点的元素可能或可能不具有键盘焦点。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下面的示例演示将键盘焦点设置的事件处理程序。The following example shows a event handler that sets keyboard focus on a . [!code-csharp[focussample#FocusSampleSetFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#focussamplesetfocus)] [!code-vb[focussample#FocusSampleSetFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#focussamplesetfocus)]

summary.span: 获取具有键盘焦点的元素。

span.span: Gets the element that has keyboard focus.
The focused element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键盘焦点是指在接收键盘输入的对象。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有键盘焦点的元素具有设置为`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以仅有一个元素具有键盘焦点在整个桌面。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 逻辑焦点是指具有焦点的焦点作用域中的对象。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有键盘焦点的元素还具有逻辑焦点提供给该元素所属的焦点作用域。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有逻辑焦点的元素可能或可能不具有键盘焦点。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下面的示例获取具有键盘焦点的元素，并将强制转换到。The following example gets the element with keyboard focus and casts it to a . 如果该元素具有键盘焦点，更改元素的背景。If the element with keyboard focus is a , the background of the element is changed. [!code-csharp[focussample#GetKeyboardFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#getkeyboardfocusedelement)] [!code-vb[focussample#GetKeyboardFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#getkeyboardfocusedelement)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.KeyStates GetKeyStates (System.Windows.Input.Key key);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.Input.KeyStates GetKeyStates(valuetype System.Windows.Input.Key key) cil managed
public: static System::Windows::Input::KeyStates GetKeyStates(System::Windows::Input::Key key);

span.span: The specified key.

summary.span: 获取指定键的键状态集。

span.span: Gets the set of key states for the specified key.
A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个位字段枚举;因此，很可能处于多种状态的键。 is a bit field enumeration; therefore, it is possible for a key to be in multiple states. 例如，一个密钥可能处于按下状态以及如下所示的切换状态。For example, a key could be in the pressed state as well as in the toggled state. 使用位比较运算来确定的完全一致的状态键所处的状态。Use bit comparison operations to determine the exact state or states the key is in. 类提供了许多静态方法还可用于获取键的状态信息。The class provides a number of static methods which can also be used to obtain key state information. 方法是： ， ，和。The methods are: , , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法可确定该键在状态。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if the key is in the state. 位 AND 运算用于比较从返回和状态。A bit AND operation is used to compare the returned from and the state. 如果密钥已关闭，背景的更改。If the key is down, the background of a is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)]

summary.span: 标识 附加事件。

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由的事件标识符是在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时创建的。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 你通常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定的路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用于确定组的特定密钥的状态。The method can be used to determine the set of states of a specific key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定特定键的状态。The following example shows how to use the method to determine the state of a specific key. 键传递给方法。The key is passed to the method. 如果该方法返回`true`，背景的更改。If the method returns `true`, the background of a is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsKeyDown](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardiskeydown)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsKeyDown](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardiskeydown)]

summary.span: 获取当前按下的 集。

span.span: Gets the set of that are currently pressed.
A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个位字段枚举，因此很可能要同时按下的多个修改键。 is a bit field enumeration, so it is possible for multiple modifier keys to be pressed at the same time. 使用位运算，以确定修改键的准确集合已按下。Use bit operations to determine the exact set of modifier keys pressed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用位 AND 比较来确定如果按下修改键。The following example uses a bit AND comparison to determine if the modifier key is pressed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyboardModifiersBitOperation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyboardmodifiersbitoperation)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyboardModifiersBitOperation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyboardmodifiersbitoperation)]
